website_summaries.verdict: Puma plucked inspiration from the 1980s RS-Computer shoe and got quite impish with the revamped version, the Puma RS-0 Ai Circuit Board. The distinct mix of colors isn’t something that’s commonly seen in Puma’s casual sneaker catalog which makes this a head turner. Its stretchy neoprene sleeve allows you to slip in and out of this shoe effortlessly, while your feet get cradled by a comfy sole. It comes right to size with a value that’s a bang for the buck.
pros: A fair sum of reviewers said the perforations on the toe of the Puma RS-0 Ai Circuit Board provides for breathability
As mentioned by most users, this kick fits perfectly
It comes with an averagely sized width, according to reviewers
The neoprene cleatie hugs the foot for a snug fit, as reviewed by most buyers
Pull tab on the heel allowed wearers to slip into this shoe effortlessly
This kick from Puma’s lifestyle sneaker collection, offers fascinating contrasting shades around the midsole, giving it a distinct character
It has a nicely contoured and foamy insole which makes it incredibly comfortable especially on the heel, as professed by delighted weartesters
cons: At least one buyer mentioned that the inner sleeve would have been a lot better if it was detached from the collar and eyestays

customer_reviews.title: Dope Sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: These Shoes are Amazing, The material(leather) feels really durable and the colours are very attractive especially at the bottom of the Shoes. When it comes to how it fits, it comfortable but it's a little narrow, seems like it would adjust to your feet when you continue to wear it. I would recommend this Sneaker to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Zoran C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear and take them out . No need to tie/untie . No enough support for arch honestly not sure that is my anatomical problem or sneakers though. I give 5 stars because it’s so light it seems it won’t easily to get loosened up material and no need to tie and untie. Thank you PS: it is not foppish it’s sporty men style Update:The price drop 25$less than I paid.I feel stupid now .
customer_reviews.author: JEFF K. A

customer_reviews.title: Another grat shoe from Rs-0 Colelction
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs from Rs-0 collection. All of them fit great and very comfortable. Design is great, People are stopping me on the street to ask about these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: EliR

customer_reviews.title: Have to break them in
customer_reviews.text: The length is spot on but the sides need to be broken in a bit. Once broken in the sides aren’t uncomfortable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Shoffies

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,great value and safe for activities at nighttime
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable,I get compliments every time I wear them. The sneakers have amazing reflective materials including the laces very safe for nighttime activity. Would highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: William Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Stay fresh
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the way they look. I get many compliments. But just a half size too small. I wish I got them a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Angel Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Kind of reminds me of New Balance sneakers as far as design goes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Northington

customer_reviews.title: Odd Feel
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried running with them yet but my initial thought is that hey don’t feel like running shoes, a lot of arch and ankle support which is nice but they don’t seem very flexible
customer_reviews.author: DaveedRuns

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneakers, I wear them every day. Sneakers made of soft leather, the skin does not lose its appearance. Strong, wear-resistant outsole. Beautiful appearance, my favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr

customer_reviews.title: Fly af
customer_reviews.text: Tight ol school pumas, love some pumas comfy and fly af. Looks better in person then online, has nice neoprene inner lining.
customer_reviews.author: Brad quattromani

customer_reviews.title: Puma great work
customer_reviews.text: Had some doubts at first, received the shoes they fit and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: William Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: I need tech support
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a father's day gift gor my self but the oder shows 2 items i only need one
customer_reviews.author: Charles Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable to wear for hours at a time, I wore it at a party.
customer_reviews.author: Le'Sean Noel

customer_reviews.title: Pick half size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and confortable shoes, but as an advice I pick a half size bigger, and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cami Herrera

customer_reviews.title: High quality material & light weight
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for everyday use, plus super comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Vivid Lanes

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's RS-0 AI Circuit Board Sneaker, Quarry Black-high Risk Red, 8 UK
product_meta.description: Back in 1987 PUMA launched the breakthrough Running System - RS. Since then, this franchise has evolved, eventually entering the world of Casual wear. In 2018, PUMA gives the RS a future-retro makeover with a totally new model that lives in the Future and yet resembles its past.
